name: html-to-css-autocompletion
description: Provides autocompletion for classes and ids from markup documents to stylesheets.

configuration.title: HTML to CSS autocompletion extension configuration

html-to-css-autocompletion.autocompletio.description:
Defines scopes for extension to work with.
multi-root: all selectors found within all root folders will be visible to all stylesheets.
workspace: all selectors found within particular workspace folder/project will be visible to stylesheets within that workspace folder.
linked files: selectors will be provided only for linked stylesheets.
Default: "multi-root"

html-to-css-autocompletion.getSelectorsF.description:
Defines file types to be searched for classes/ids.
Defaults: ["html", "php"]

html-to-css-autocompletion.provideSelect.description:
Defines file types to be provided with autocompletion.
Defaults: ["css"]

html-to-css-autocompletion.folderNamesTo.description: Defines only specific folder names to be searched. Default: [""]
Defines folder names to be excluded from being searched. Default: ["node_modules"]

html-to-css-autocompletion.includePatter.description: Set custom glob pattern to get classes/ids from matched files. E.g.: **/{folderName1,folderName2,...}/*.{fileType1,fileType2,...}

html-to-css-autocompletion.excludePatter.description: Set custom glob pattern to exclude search on pattern matches. E.g.: **/{folderName1,folderName2,...}/**
